comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): number of chop saws to purchase
- \( y \): number of steel cutters to purchase

Extracted Parameters:
- \( A \): pounds of steel that a chop saw can work (25 pounds)
- \( B \): pounds of steel that a steel cutter can work (5 pounds)
- \( C \): units of waste generated by a chop saw (25 units)
- \( D \): units of waste generated by a steel cutter (3 units)
- \( E \): total pounds of metal that needs to be cut every day (520 pounds)
- \( F \): maximum units of waste that can be produced every day (400 units)
